title: Maple Leaf
heading: VIA Rail & Amtrak's Maple Leaf
programmers_warning: VIA Rail GTFS has a bug and is missing the weekend schedule difference.  This is ONLY FOR TESTING.
top_text:
The Maple Leaf is operated jointly by VIA Rail and Amtrak.
Local tickets within the US can be bought from Amtrak.

Appropriate documentation (passports, visas, vaccination cards, etc.) is required to cross the US-Canadian border; please check government websites for details.
